trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Et standard sluttpunkt med en fast <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> binding som automatisk legger til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"> </xref> virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST service.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette endepunktet under skriving av en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resten tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om automatiske Formater utvalg er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: When automatic format selection is enabled, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure parses the `Accept` header of the request message and determines the most appropriate response format.
trans-unit.target: Når automatisk Formater utvalg er aktivert, den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur analyserer den `Accept` hodet til forespørselsmeldingen og bestemmer mest aktuelle svarformat.

trans-unit.source: If the `Accept` header does not specify a suitable response format, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure uses the `Content-Type` of the request message or the default response format of the operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `Accept` hodet angir ikke en passende svarformat den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] bruker den `Content-Type` forespørselsmeldingen eller svar standardformatet for operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic format selection is enabled, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis automatisk Formater utvalg er aktivert, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing response format.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utgående svar standardformatet.

trans-unit.source: The default response format for the endpoint.
Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir flagget som angir om en FaultException genereres når en intern serverfeil (HTTP-statuskode: 500) forekommer.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis flagget er aktivert; hvis ikke, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the HTTP help page is enabled for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om siden for HTTP-help er aktivert for sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the HTTP help page is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis HTTP Hjelp-siden er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
